attributes.action: reccomend Halifax poet Cayn White for poet laureate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cayn White is the hardest working poet in christendom and with the position becoming vacant i thought i'd be a bit cheeky and say Cayn for poet laureate.

rejection.details: This is not a matter of government policy and we do not accept petitions about individual appointments.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
